SEARCH
Package risk.server.network

Klasse GameServer

java.lang.Object
risk.server.network.GameServer
public class GameServer extends Object
Manages incoming client connections, game state, and communication among clients in a Risk game server. Handles client connections through ClientRequestHandler2 instances, manages player states, and facilitates game preparation and broadcasting messages to connected clients.

  • Felddetails

    • playerID

      public int playerID

  • Konstruktordetails

    • GameServer

      public GameServer(int port, String data)
      Constructs a GameServer2 object. Initializes the server on the specified port and initializes the game with the provided data.
      Parameter:
      port - The port number on which the server will listen for client connections.
      data - The initial data for setting up the game.

  • Methodendetails

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts the server and listens for incoming client connections. Creates a new ClientRequestHandler2 for each connected client, starts a new thread for each handler, and sends a welcome message to the client.

    • addClient

      public void addClient(ClientRequestHandler client)
      Adds a ClientRequestHandler2 instance to the list of active client handlers.
      Parameter:
      client - The ClientRequestHandler2 instance representing the connected client.

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(Player player)
      Adds a player to the game server's list of active players.
      Parameter:
      player - The Player object representing the player to be added.

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer(Player player)
      Removes a player from the game server's list of active players.
      Parameter:
      player - The Player object representing the player to be removed.

    • addIsReady

      public void addIsReady(int playerID)
      Marks a player as ready to start the game.
      Parameter:
      playerID - The ID of the player to mark as ready.

    • removeIsReady

      public void removeIsReady(int playerID)
      Marks a player as not ready to start the game.
      Parameter:
      playerID - The ID of the player to mark as not ready.

    • isReady

      public boolean isReady(int playerID)
      Checks if a specific player is ready to start the game.
      Parameter:
      playerID - The ID of the player to check.
      Gibt zurück:
      True if the player is ready, false otherwise.

    • getIsReady

      public boolean[] getIsReady()
      Retrieves the array indicating the readiness status of all players.
      Gibt zurück:
      An array of booleans representing the readiness status of each player.

    • broadcastMessage

      public void broadcastMessage(String message)
      Broadcasts a message to all connected clients.
      Parameter:
      message - The message to broadcast to all clients.

    • removeClient

      public void removeClient(ClientRequestHandler client)
      Removes a client from the list of active client handlers.
      Parameter:
      client - The ClientRequestHandler2 instance representing the client to remove.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main method to start the GameServer2 instance on a specified port.
      Parameter:
      args - Command-line arguments (not used).
